The Heavy Duty Grooved Rubber Matting is a premium industrial-grade flooring solution designed to provide maximum durability, strong slip resistance, and lasting comfort. Built for demanding environments, it delivers reliable performance in gyms, workshops, commercial entrances, and outdoor walkways. The dual-pattern surface—featuring a bubble-textured top and a grooved underside—ensures excellent traction, shock absorption, and stability even under heavy loads. Now available in Nepal with exceptional quality for both commercial and industrial applications.

• Weather-resistant design suitable for both indoor and outdoor installation
